body:
I'm checking to see if we have a copy on file-otherwise we can scan  
Greg's and make it available
Steve




On Jun 10, 2009, at 11:49 AM, R Fritz wrote:


>> I don't think this report exists online, and only a few copies  
>> exist.  I have one in my closet.
>
> Hee.  Thanks for the quick reply.  I'll drop a note to LBL's  
> archivists; there may be a copy somewhere in their stacks that they  
> can copy or even lend.
>
> Randolph
